amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of funds made available by this Act may be used by the Environmental Protection Agency to issue, implement, administer, or enforce any regulation of particulate matter emissions from residential barbecues.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds by EPA to issue, implement, administer, or enforce any regulation of particulate matter emissions from residential barbecues.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hudson amendment (A094) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hudson amendment (A094) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A094) offered by Mr. Hudson.
